title.value: NCH Primary Payer Code (if not Medicare)

description.value: The code, on an institutional claim, specifying a federal non-Medicare program or other source that has primary responsibility for the payment of the Medicare beneficiary's health insurance bills. The presence of a primary payer code indicates that some other payer besides Medicare covered at least some portion of the charges. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/nch_prmry_pyr_cd
